==September==
*[[Gaffer Gamgee]], [[Old Noakes]], [[Daddy Twofoot]], [[Sandyman]] and other strangers are at the ''[[Ivy Bush]]'' and gossip about [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]] and [[Frodo Baggins]].<ref name=party>{{FR|Party}}</ref>
*(two days later) Rumors begin that Bilbo's party will have fireworks.<ref name=party/>
*A [[Dwarves of Erebor|Dwarf]]-wagon loaded with packages comes to [[Bag End]].<ref name=party/>
*c. '''[[15 September|15]]'''<ref>"At the end of the second week in September"</ref> - [[Gandalf]] rides a cart over the [[Brandywine Bridge]], through [[Bywater]] and reaches Bag End.<ref name=party/>
*The following day and week more wagons and carts arrive. Bilbo sends orders for provisions from the neighboring regions.<ref name=party/>
* '''[[21 September|21]]''' - Cloudy weather over [[Hobbiton]].<ref name=party/>
* '''[[22 September|22]]''' - [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Bilbo's farewell feast]]. [[Gandalf]] suspects Bilbo's ring to be [[the One Ring]].<ref name=party/><ref name="TA">{{App|TA}}</ref>
* '''[[23 September|23]]''' - [[Frodo Baggins]] inherits [[Bag End]] and has a hard time managing the inheritance and distributing Bilbo's gifts. At the evening [[Gandalf]] departs seeking for news of [[Gollum]].<ref name=party/><ref name="TA"/>
*Gandalf calls on the help of [[Aragorn]]. The [[Rangers of the North]] double their guard on [[the Shire]].<ref name="TA"/> 
{{references}}
[[Category:Third Age years|3, Third Age 3001]]
